Table of Contents

Name

glIsList - determine if a name corresponds to a display-list

C Specification

GLboolean glIsList( GLuint list ) 


 

Parameters






list 


Specifies a potential display-list name. 





Description

glIsList
returns GL_TRUE if list is the name of a display list and returns GL_FALSE
otherwise. 

Errors

GL_INVALID_OPERATION is generated if glIsList is executed
between the execution of glBegin and the corresponding execution of glEnd.


See Also

glCallList(3G)
, glCallLists(3G)
, glDeleteLists(3G)
, glGenLists(3G)
,
glNewList(3G)
